pkgmetadata.longdescription: An 'Rcpp' Interface for Eunjeon Project // An 'Rcpp' interface for Eunjeon project http://eunjeon.blogspot.com/. The 'mecab- ko' and 'mecab-ko-dic' is based on a C++ library, and part-of- speech tagging with them is useful when the spacing of source Korean text is not correct. This package provides part-of- speech tagging and tokenization function for Korean text.
